sources.title: Duel.
sources.description: Duel is a 1971 thriller directed by Steven Spielberg, focusing on a traveling salesman named David Mann, who is pursued and terrorized by the unseen driver of a menacing semi-truck while driving through rural California. The film explores themes of isolation and survival as Mann's ordinary journey turns into a desperate fight for his life against the relentless truck.

metadata.Plot: While traveling through the desert for an appointment with a client, the businessman David Mann from California passes a slow and old tanker truck. The psychotic truck driver feels offended and chases David along the empty highway trying to kill him.
metadata.Actors: Dennis Weaver, Jacqueline Scott, Eddie Firestone
metadata.Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. 3 wins & 5 nominations total
